level.text: The principal building and any accessory building on the lot shall not exceed a total lot occupancy of thirty percent (30%).
The maximum impervious surface coverage on a lot shall be fifty percent (50 %); provided this subsection shall not:
Preclude enlargement of a principal building in existence as of March 20, 1992; and
Create nonconformity of a structure as regulated by chapter 20 of this title.

level.heading: SOURCE
